description.value:
Your Gray Gardener training has made you deeply skilled with the weapons that execute with a swift chop to the neck. You become trained with the following weapons: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Battle Axe]{Battle Axe}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Falchion]{Falchion}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Greataxe]{Greataxe}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Scimitar]{Scimitar}.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency with a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency for these weapons.
